name: Dance of Death (itch)
description:
You find yourself alone in a mysterious house. The last thing you remember is being at a dance competition and coming first place after you bust the phattest of moves on the dance floor. Find out where and why you're in this strange place, and if there's a way out! But be careful....you might not be alone....

Controls:

  • Arrows Keys, X, C to dance
  • E to interact
